TextLibrary.Text: Darkhunter
Liandra has sent me another message.
Liandra has sent me another message.
Liandra has sent me another message.
Liandra has sent me another message.
What does she want?
What does she want?
What does she want?
What does she want?
She has asked me to meet with her - alone. She wants to discuss returning with me here to Ylarie.
She has asked me to meet with her - alone. She wants to discuss returning with me here to Ylarie.
She has asked me to meet with her - alone. She wants to discuss returning with me here to Ylarie.
She has asked me to meet with her - alone. She wants to discuss returning with me here to Ylarie.
You don't believe her do you? She's Undead, Syrus. She can't be trusted. I know she was once someone important to you, but that person is long gone.
You don't believe her do you? She's Undead, Syrus. She can't be trusted. I know she was once someone important to you, but that person is long gone.
You don't believe her do you? She's Undead, Syrus. She can't be trusted. I know she was once someone important to you, but that person is long gone.
You don't believe her do you? She's Undead, Syrus. She can't be trusted. I know she was once someone important to you, but that person is long gone.
I... know. But still... if there is a chance...
I... know. But still... if there is a chance...
I... know. But still... if there is a chance...
I... know. But still... if there is a chance...
It's a trap, Syrus. Let me come with you. I'll stay out of sight if I must, but I'll be there in case you get into trouble.
It's a trap, Syrus. Let me come with you. I'll stay out of sight if I must, but I'll be there in case you get into trouble.
It's a trap, Syrus. Let me come with you. I'll stay out of sight if I must, but I'll be there in case you get into trouble.
It's a trap, Syrus. Let me come with you. I'll stay out of sight if I must, but I'll be there in case you get into trouble.
Very well. Thank you. She wants me to meet her outside of Skullguard Keep, north of here.
Very well. Thank you. She wants me to meet her outside of Skullguard Keep, north of here.
